trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en mängd <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: A GridViewColumnCollection object contains a set of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> objects that are typically used to define the columns of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object.
trans-unit.target: Ett GridViewColumnCollection-objekt innehåller en uppsättning <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>objekt som normalt används för att definiera kolumnerna i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> that defines the layout of data in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>är en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>som definierar placeringen av data i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To receive notification of changes in the collection, monitor the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> event that is inherited from <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: Övervaka <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged>händelser som har ärvts från <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> för att ta emot meddelanden om ändringar i samlingen

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Removes all of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> objects from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tar bort alla de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> objekt från den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> to the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> till samlingen med det angivna indexet.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a new item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection> without replacing another item.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden skapar ett nytt objekt i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection>utan att ersätta ett annat objekt.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: To replace an item in the collection with a new item, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.SetItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ersätt ett objekt i samlingen med ett nytt objekt genom att använda den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.SetItem%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.SetItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The position to place the new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Möjlighet att placera den nya <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> to insert.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> att infoga.

trans-unit.source: Changes the position of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Flyttar ett <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The original position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den ursprungliga placeringen av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The new position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den nya placeringen av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> event when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Genererar den <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> händelsen när den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"> </xref> ändringar.

trans-unit.source: The event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Händelseargument.

trans-unit.source: Removes a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Tar bort en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> från den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"> </xref> med det angivna indexet.

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: Positionen för den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> att ta bort.

trans-unit.source: Replaces the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> that is at the specified index with another <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ersätter den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> som är med det angivna indexet med en annan <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method replaces a column in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection> with a new column.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden ersätter en kolumn i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection>med en ny kolumn.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: To insert a new column without replacing another column, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.InsertItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill infoga en ny kolumn utan att ersätta en annan kolumn, använda den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.InsertItem%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.InsertItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The position at which the new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> replaces the old <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Positionen där den nya <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> ersätter gammalt <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> to place at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> ska placeras vid den angivna positionen.
